tool_description: Viva City APIs for Venue & Menu
name: Viva City Documentation
title: Viva City Documentation

api_list.name: MenuDetails
api_list.description: Get menu details using KV (need resync to get latest data) and filter dynamic multi language data based on query params.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: You can get the list of the menu ids from ```/vebue-i8n/menus/{id}/details```  with the key of  **"menu_item"**

api_list.name: VenueDetails
api_list.description: Get venue details using KV (need resync to get latest data) and filter dynamic multi language data based on query params.
